page.title: 20FARMS INNERLEITHEN
page.content: {Nether Pirn Farm:}On the banks of the Tweed next the school:Stock:62 cows giving milk:23 dry cows:29 young heifers 6_18mths:4 baby heifer calves younger than 6mths:66 acres of grass giving 1000tons silage for winter feed 40acres for milking cows to graze. Remainder for dry cows and in calf heifers.Total number animals 133. {Haughead Farm:}On the banks of the Tweed opposite the school:Hill ground for sheep 40 acres:Arable ground for hay 15 acres:Rough grazing for sheep and cattle 55 acres:110 Black faced Ewes:32 cattle feeding for beef. {Kirklands Farm}(280acres):On the banks of the Leithen Water:Blue Grey cattle and Hereford Fresian for beef graze on this land:Mostly sheep on this farm:Grow grass for silage and hay: Grow about 10 acres turnips for sheep in winter.
